Articles.Content: I just want to see if any KSP players would be willing to go on the Lazarus Missions from Interstellar. I, by no means would, but would some of you sign up?

> 
> I just want to see if any KSP players would be willing to go on the Lazarus Missions from Interstellar. I, by no means would, but would some of you sign up?

If Earth is in the same situation as the movie, and I am able to, then hell yes. There is no point staying on Earth in that movie.
Go take a bath in what should have been fatal x-Rays? How about an option to just build O'Neil colonies (as they did anyway).
